reference.shortdesc: The glossAbbreviation element provides an abbreviated form of the term. An abbreviated form is typically formed by omitting some letters from a longer form. find alternative description. use of "abbreviated form" to me implies a relationship to <abbreviated-form>

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The glossAbbreviation element is specialized from title. It is defined in the glossary entry module.

example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows how the glossAbbreviation is used in a glossary entry topic:
example.codeblock: <glossentry id="adjective"> <glossterm>adjective</glossterm> <glossdef>A word that describes a noun or noun phrase</glossdef> <glossBody> <glossAlt> <glossAbbreviation>adj</glossAbbreviation> </glossAlt> </glossBody> </glossentry>
